title: MetaColonies
author: MetaColonies
content: MetaColonies Land is a Metaverse MMO strategy game where two types of players, Space Cowboys and Space Pirates, work together to achieve higher tier yields, rewards, ships, buildings and construct and discover higher tier and rarer artifacts.MetaColonies Land hold the initiatives and complies with the standards and ethic principles of Metaverse meta-ethical framework which based on the moral theory of Alan Gewirth, necessary for determining what, if any, ought to be the ethics that guide the conduct of people participating in virtual worlds in their roles as designers, administrators and players or avatars.WEB: https://metacolonies.io/TELEGRAM: https://t.me/MetaColoniesTWITTER: https://twitter.com/MetaColoniesContract: https://bscscan.com/address/0xdde763081139457c24f54afa1f99590886cff324SPACEMAPThe spacemap focuses on the development of the technology, operations infrastructure, new partnerships, and marketing initiatives.PHASE 1✔️ Token Launch, Development✔️ BSC Launch✔️ Design, Graphics✔️ Private Sale Start➖ Presale➖ DEX Listing - 21 June➖ 2000 Holders➖ CoinGecko Listing➖ CoinMarketCap Listing➖ Audit➖ 10000 HoldersPHASE 2➖ Airdrop➖ Big Marketing Campaigns✔️ BSCScan Info Updated➖ More Marketing Campaigns➖ Influencer➖ Various Adds➖ metacolonies LAND Browser Game➖ Social Media Presence➖ 20000 HoldersPHASE 3➖ Cool Merchandise➖ Solid Partnerships➖ CEX Listing➖ MetaColonies LAND Mini Game➖ 30000 HoldersPHASE 4➖ Big Marketing Plans➖ Major Partnerships➖ Real World Events➖ 80000 HoldersPHASE 5➖ MetaColonies  LAND Game➖ MetaColonies  Swap➖ MetaColonies  NFT Marketplace➖ 100000 HoldersMetaColonies Private SalePrivate Sale Price 1 $Colonies = 0.1 BUSDMin Buy 50 BUSDMax Buy 5000 BUSDSend BUSD Private Sale WalletPrivate Sale Wallet:  0x238F6D87651798Aa45cCFFd3Cd9188ab13cAFB8fThe number of tokens is automatically generated at the BUSD rate at the time of purchase. After successful payment, the sends tokens to the wallet within 30 minutes or 24 hours.Token Allocation Private Sale:1.000.000 $ColoniesSoft Cap: 30,000 BUSDHard Cap: 100,000 BUSDLink: https://forms.gle/9ijRcCK2qavWg5D38Web: https://metacolonies.io/Telegram: https://t.me/MetaColoniesTwitter: https://twitter.com/metacoloniesEmail: admin@metacolonies.io
